column5: planning to  hit the lake tomorrow and i do not feel like driving my truck out on the ice anyone go out today and if so is there enough snow for snowmobiles
I live about 2km's away and I have atleast 14 inches in my driveway.  I think it's a safe bet that you'll have no problems with a sled on Simcoe tomorrow
Yep what Bill said. It,s that nice light fluffy stuff,so it will be flying over yer head as yer blasting around. Just becareful of any pressure cracks that you wont be able to see.
thanks alot guys.....anyone else fishing it tomrow?
I'm hoping I can still drive my 2wd truck out off willow beach tommorow and sun.
I was out today and theres plenty of snow for a sled. The wind has it all blown into drifts so its a snow drift and then bare ice for a few feet and then snow drift again.
